name: NocoDB
semantic_context: Read, update, write and delete data from NocoDB
natural_language_description: 这是 NocoDB 节点。主要用于: Read, update, write and delete data from NocoDB

authentication.name: authentication
authentication.natural_language_description: 参数名: Authentication | 默认值: nocoDb

version.name: version
version.natural_language_description: 参数名: API Version | 默认值: 3

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: row

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: get
available_options: Get Many (值: getAll) - Retrieve many rows

workspaceId.name: workspaceId
workspaceId.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression
workspaceId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Workspace Name or ID | 作用: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression | 默认值: none

projectId.name: projectId
projectId.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression
projectId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Project Name or ID | 作用: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression | (必填项)

table.name: table
table.natural_language_description: 参数名: Table | 作用: The name of the table | (必填项)

primaryKey.name: primaryKey
primaryKey.natural_language_description: 参数名: Primary Key Type | 默认值: id
available_options: Default (值: id) - Default, added when table was created from UI by those options: Create new table / Import from Excel / Import from CSV
Imported From Airtable (值: ncRecordId) - Select if table was imported from Airtable
Custom (值: custom) - When connecting to existing external database as existing primary key field is retained as is, enter the name of the primary key field below

id.name: id
id.description: The value of the ID field
id.natural_language_description: 参数名: Row ID Value | 作用: The value of the ID field | (必填项)

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
returnAll.natural_language_description: 参数名: Return All | 作用: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit | 默认值: False

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit | 作用: Max number of results to return | 默认值: 50

downloadAttachments.name: downloadAttachments
downloadAttachments.description: Whether the attachment fields define in 'Download Fields' will be downloaded
downloadAttachments.natural_language_description: 参数名: Download Attachments | 作用: Whether the attachment fields define in 'Download Fields' will be downloaded | 默认值: False

downloadFieldNames.name: downloadFieldNames
downloadFieldNames.description: Name of the fields of type 'attachment' that should be downloaded. Multiple ones can be defined separated by comma. Case sensitive.
downloadFieldNames.natural_language_description: 参数名: Download Fields | 作用: Name of the fields of type 'attachment' that should be downloaded. Multiple ones can be defined separated by comma. Case sensitive. | (必填项)

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: viewId (值: None) - The select fields of the returned rows
fields (值: None) - The select fields of the returned rows
sort (值: None) - The sorting rules for the returned rows
where (值: None) - A formula used to filter rows

dataToSend.name: dataToSend
dataToSend.description: Whether to insert the input data this node receives in the new row
dataToSend.natural_language_description: 参数名: Data to Send | 作用: Whether to insert the input data this node receives in the new row | 默认值: defineBelow
available_options: Auto-Map Input Data to Columns (值: autoMapInputData) - Use when node input properties match destination column names
Define Below for Each Column (值: defineBelow) - Set the value for each destination column

info.displayName: This operation requires the primary key to be included for each row.
info.name: info
info.natural_language_description: 参数名: This operation requires the primary key to be included for each row.

inputsToIgnore.name: inputsToIgnore
inputsToIgnore.description: List of input properties to avoid sending, separated by commas. Leave empty to send all properties.
inputsToIgnore.natural_language_description: 参数名: Inputs to Ignore | 作用: List of input properties to avoid sending, separated by commas. Leave empty to send all properties.

fieldsUi.name: fieldsUi
fieldsUi.natural_language_description: 参数名: Fields to Send | 默认值: {}
